# Emitter Shape

**API Collection**

The emission shape is a one, two or three dimensional shape that defines where the emitted particles originate. The shapes are defined by a subset of [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterPosition], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterZPosition], [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterSize] and [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterDepth] properties.

## Constants

- **point**: Particles are emitted from a single point at (`emitterPosition.x`, `emitterPosition.y`, `emitterZPosition`)
- **line**: Particles are emitted along a line from (`emitterPosition.x - emitterSize.width/2`, `emitterPosition.y`, `emitterZPosition`) to (`emitterPosition.x + emitterSize.width/2`, `emitterPosition.y`, `emitterZPosition`).
- **rectangle**: Particles are emitted from a rectangle with opposite corners [emitterPosition.x - emitterSize.width/2, emitterPosition.y - emitterSize.height/2, emitterZPosition], [emitterPosition.x + emitterSize.width/2, emitterPosition.y + emitterSize.height/2, emitterZPosition].
- **cuboid**: Particles are emitted from a cuboid (3D rectangle) with opposite corners: [emitterPosition.x - emitterSize.width/2, emitterPosition.y - emitterSize.height/2, emitterZPosition - emitterDepth/2], [emitterPosition.x + emitterSize.width/2, emitterPosition.y + emitterSize.height/2, emitterZPosition+emitterDepth/2].
- **circle**: Particles are emitted from a circle centered at (`emitterPosition.x`, `emitterPosition.y`, `emitterZPosition`) of radius `emitterSize.width`.
- **sphere**: Particles are emitted from a sphere centered at (`emitterPosition.x`, `emitterPosition.y`, `emitterZPosition`) of radius `emitterSize.width`.

## Constants

- **Emitter Modes**: These constants specify the possible emitter modes. They are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/emitterMode] property.
- **Emitter Render Order**: These constants specify the order that emitter cells are composited. They are used by the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CAEmitterLayer/renderMode] property.
